Naming your monsters
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: November2013 Topics: Naming your monsters
By OgreBattle on Saturday, November 9, 2013 - 03:14 pm:

Hello!

I always have been curious about this idea. Naming a monster can make you get really attached to them in an emotional way, or get really attached to them in an absolutely hilarious way (example of my favorite monster ever: http://i.imgur.com/x60KZbm.png ).

What are some of the names of monsters you remember fondly? Some off the top of my head are:

Renegade (Golem/Hengar)
Garu (Garu/Garu) (I can't be the only one that kept it)
Nagasaki (Zan/The desert biome)
Jingbo (Zan/Dragon) (The name of a desert)
Kramer (Dragon/Golem)
Pharaoh (Naga/Mocchi)
